quotes.quote: The man who has no imagination has no wings.
Our words have wings, but fly not where we would.
Wings are not only for birds; they are also for minds. Human potential stops at some point somewhere beyond infinity.
The wings of transformation are born of patience and struggle.
Our wings are small but the ripples of the heart are infinite.
You cannot fly like an eagle with the wings of a wren.
Even angels must find their wings too heavy sometimes.
Birds have wings; they're free; they can fly where they want when they want. They have the kind of mobility many people envy.
Go to the edge of the cliff and jump off. Build your wings on the way down.
Carry your wings of hope so high in the sky that there is no room left for disappointments.
His wings were failing, but he refused to fall without a struggle.
We have to continually be jumping off cliffs and developing our wings on the way down.
A broken wing simply means, you have to find another way to fly. Have a wonderful day people.
Spread your wings of love and fly in someone's sky of dream and imagination.
We all have wings, but they have not been of any avail to us and if we could tear them off, we would do so.
Wings are freedom only when they are wide open in flight. On one's back they are a heavy weight.
The reason birds can fly and we can't is simply because they have perfect faith, for to have faith is to have wings.
With wings, the space between the lines is less,We had to run so much while on the defensive that we came up short offensively.
When the stormy winds of life threaten to knock you down, may you have the courage to spread your wings and fly!
No bird can fly without opening its wings, and no one can love without exposing their hearts.
Wings are like dreams. Before each flight, a bird takes a small jump, a leap of faith, believing that its wings will work. That jump can only be made with rock solid feet.
We were all born with wings. In times of doubt: spread them.
A bird does not fly because it has wings; it has wings because it flies.

Wings was a blessing, but it was also very difficult. Whenever you do situation comedy, no matter how excellent the execution and we had a great cast and great writers but the format is somewhat limited.
Wings are a constraint that makes it possible to fly.
You can put wings on a pig, but you don't make it an eagle.
Flying without feathers is not easy; my wings have no feathers.
Keep up your faith to go high and fly, even after so many pains and sorrow. You can turn from a caterpillar to a butterfly. Life gives you a second change: a call to grow.
Until you spread your wings, you'll have no idea how far you can fly.
Intelligence without ambition is a bird without wings.
